types.html:
tuses

  1. (Quebec, slang, nonstandard) second-person singular present subjunctive of tuer
    • 1973, Jean-Marie Poupart, Chère Touffe, c'est plein plein de fautes dans ta lettre d'amour, pages 184–185:
      […] c'est un grand hostie de calâbre mais pissou comme un singe, veux pas à lune, veux pas que tu l'tuses non plus, […] — "he's a big piece of meat, but scared as a kitty, won't do anyting, but he's still scared you might kill him"
      (please add an English translation of this quotation)
